examples.example: 我精心挑选了一份礼物送给亲爱的妈妈。

translate.english: I carefully selected a gift and gave it to dear mother.

examples.example: 我把自己亲手制作的卡片送给敬爱的老师，表达我的感激之情。

translate.english: I gave the card made by myself to the beloved teacher to express my gratitude.

examples.example: 我把精心准备的鲜花送给可爱的朋友，祝她天天开心。

translate.english: I give the elaborately prepared flowers to the lovely friend and wish her happy every day.
